Chemical.content:

Paragraph: Seizures also result in changes to CCR2 receptor expression in neurons and astrocytes .

Sure! Here are the "Chemical" entities in the paragraph:

1. CCR2 receptor

The CCR2 receptor is a protein that is expressed on the surface of certain cells, including neurons and astrocytes. It is a chemical entity because it is a molecule made up of atoms and molecules.
